Package com.tinocs.mp.client

Interface ClientEventHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GreenfootEventHandler
    public interface ClientEventHandler
    The ClientEventHandler interface provides methods for responding to messages from the server or from other clients.
    Version:
    6/6/2023
    Author:
    Ted McLeod

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String NO_SUCH_ROOM
      Joining a room failed because the room does not exist
      static java.lang.String ROOM_CLOSED
      Joining a room failed because the room was closed
      static java.lang.String ROOM_FULL
      Joining a room failed because the room was full

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void handleAddRoomFailed​(java.lang.String roomName, int capacity, Client client)
      Called when an attempt to add a room to the server fails.
      default void handleClientJoinedRoom​(java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String roomId, Client client)
      Called when a client joins a room.
      default void handleClientLeftRoom​(java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String roomId, Client client)
      Called when a client leaves a room.
      default void handleCommand​(java.lang.String command, Client client)
      Respond to the given command from another client.
      default void handleJoinRoomFailed​(java.lang.String reason, java.lang.String roomId, Client client)
      Called when an attempt by the client with this event handler to join a room fails.
      default void handleOtherClientDisconnected​(java.lang.String clientId, Client client)
      Called when another client disconnects from the server.
      default void handleOtherClientJoined​(java.lang.String clientId, Client client)
      Called when another client joins the server.
      default void handleRoomAdded​(RoomInfo room, Client client)
      Called when a room is added to the server
      default void handleRoomClosed​(java.lang.String roomId, Client client)
      Called when a room is closed (blocking clients from joining).
      default void handleRoomOpened​(java.lang.String roomId, Client client)
      Called when a room is opened (allowing clients to join)
      default void handleRoomOwnership​(java.lang.String roomId, java.lang.String ownerId, Client client)
      Called when the ownership of a room changes.
      default void handleRoomRemoved​(java.lang.String roomId, Client client)
      Called when a room is removed from the server
      default void onDisconnected​(Client client)
      This method is called when this client is disconnected from the server.
      default void onIdAssigned​(java.lang.String clientId, Client client)
      Do what needs to be done when this client is assigned an ID by the server.

    • Method Detail

      • handleCommand

        default void handleCommand​(java.lang.String command,
                           Client client)
        Respond to the given command from another client. Recommendation: first make this method simply print the command so you can see how to parse it.
        Parameters:
        command - the message to respond to
        client - the client the command was received by

      • onIdAssigned

        default void onIdAssigned​(java.lang.String clientId,
                          Client client)
        Do what needs to be done when this client is assigned an ID by the server.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id assigned to this client by the server
        client - the client the command was received by

      • onDisconnected

        default void onDisconnected​(Client client)
        This method is called when this client is disconnected from the server. Subclasses should override this method to take actions after this client has been disconnected.
        Parameters:
        client - the client the command was received by

      • handleOtherClientJoined

        default void handleOtherClientJoined​(java.lang.String clientId,
                                     Client client)
        Called when another client joins the server.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id of the client that joined
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleOtherClientDisconnected

        default void handleOtherClientDisconnected​(java.lang.String clientId,
                                           Client client)
        Called when another client disconnects from the server.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id of the client that disconnected
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleRoomAdded

        default void handleRoomAdded​(RoomInfo room,
                             Client client)
        Called when a room is added to the server
        Parameters:
        room - a RoomInfo object defining the room that was added
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleAddRoomFailed

        default void handleAddRoomFailed​(java.lang.String roomName,
                                 int capacity,
                                 Client client)
        Called when an attempt to add a room to the server fails. Typically this happens when the server has already reached maximum rooms and a command to make another room is sent.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the proposed name of the room that failed to be created
        capacity - the proposed capacity of the room that failed to be created
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleRoomRemoved

        default void handleRoomRemoved​(java.lang.String roomId,
                               Client client)
        Called when a room is removed from the server
        Parameters:
        roomId - the id of the room that was removed
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleClientJoinedRoom

        default void handleClientJoinedRoom​(java.lang.String clientId,
                                    java.lang.String roomId,
                                    Client client)
        Called when a client joins a room.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id of the client that joined the room
        roomId - the id of the room the client joined
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleJoinRoomFailed

        default void handleJoinRoomFailed​(java.lang.String reason,
                                  java.lang.String roomId,
                                  Client client)
        Called when an attempt by the client with this event handler to join a room fails. The reason given could be:
        • ROOM_FULL
        • ROOM_CLOSED
        • NO_SUCH_ROOM
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason given for failure
        roomId - the id of the room
        client - the client that received this command (also the one who tried to join the room)

      • handleClientLeftRoom

        default void handleClientLeftRoom​(java.lang.String clientId,
                                  java.lang.String roomId,
                                  Client client)
        Called when a client leaves a room.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id of the client that left the room
        roomId - the id of the room the client left
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleRoomOwnership

        default void handleRoomOwnership​(java.lang.String roomId,
                                 java.lang.String ownerId,
                                 Client client)
        Called when the ownership of a room changes.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the id of the room the for which ownership changed
        ownerId - the id of the new owner
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleRoomClosed

        default void handleRoomClosed​(java.lang.String roomId,
                              Client client)
        Called when a room is closed (blocking clients from joining).
        Parameters:
        roomId - the id of the room that was closed
        client - the client that received this command

      • handleRoomOpened

        default void handleRoomOpened​(java.lang.String roomId,
                              Client client)
        Called when a room is opened (allowing clients to join)
        Parameters:
        roomId - the id of the room that was closed
        client - the client that received this command
